 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָפַד‎</span> **verb** ==draw together, contract== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, trams; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind fast, shackle***, compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M § 46</sup> who compare Mand <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סאפטים‎</span> ***fetters***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> [[Lam.4.8|Lam 4:8]] their skin ***contracteth, shrivelleth***, upon (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵל‎</span>) their bones. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָפָה‎</span> [[Ezek.32.6|Ezek 32:6]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוף‎</span>
